item.title: Block Blast
item.description: Block Blast # 8x8 game area Score calculation # number of of tiles placed Data Points # Clearing whole game 300 Clearing one row with no combo = 10 Clearing two rows with no combo = 20 Clearing three rows with no combo = 60 4 rows no combo 120 Clearing five row with no combo = 200 Clearing 5 row with 2 combo = 3 r
